content.description:
NO CALCULATOR IS ALLOWED FOR THIS QUESTION.

Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <msqrt> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaWG4bGaaiykaiabg2da9maakaaabaGaci4yaiaac+gacaGGZbGa amiEaaWcbeaaaaa@3E28@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>x</mi> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbWdamaabmaabaWdbiaadIhaa8aacaGLOaGaayzkaaWdbiab g2da9iaabccacaWGLbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaadIhaaaaaaa@3DA2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, and the vertical line <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mi>Ï€</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaeqiWdahabaGaaGOmaaaacaGGSaaaaa@3B32@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: (a) Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the area of R.

frqParts.text: (a) Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the area of R.
(b) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

(c) Region R is the base of a solid whose cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are semicircles with diameters on the xy-plane. Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the volume of this solid.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
